modlee.model.model module

Modlee model class and callbacks.

class modlee.model.model.ModleeModel(data_snapshot_size=10000000.0, kwargs_cache={}, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: LightningModule

__init__(data_snapshot_size=10000000.0, kwargs_cache={}, *args, **kwargs) → None[source]

ModleeModel constructor.

Parameters:

  • data_snapshot_size – The maximum size of the data snapshots saved during meta-feature calculation.

  • vars_cache – A dictionary of variables to cache for later rebuilding the model.
